attributes.review: this app is awful, it’s difficult to go places on the app. It takes forever to login in. just no.

attributes.review: I download this app so i can text the president not to banned tiktok but then the app hacked my phone and played horrible music that attracted rats to my house and they ate my dog

attributes.review: We love a good spray tan, but this man did an overload of it, we love a good natural look now. We wanted a wall built too but that didn’t happen :(( SAVE BARRON!!!!!!!!!! Also ew the vibes are disgusting from this orange child 👶
attributes.title: We don’t stan 🖕

attributes.review: this app is so terrible got it from the wonderful guy who wants to save tiktok but this took days to download onto my phone i have good wifi and it wasn’t even good had no purpose of being on here since we hear enough about this stuff in everyday life terrible app don’t ever download
attributes.title: don’t get this app!!!

attributes.review: It’s laggy and everything keeps glitching. You’d think for a president he would’ve hired better coders but I guess not. 1 star

attributes.review: This was a waste of time. How do you make America great again when your the thing tearing it apart? I recommend no one download this

attributes.review: Whoever believes that this is a good app is a 🤡It caused my phone to glitch, overheated my phone, and took up all of my space. Overall don’t download

attributes.review: I love my president 😻 but this app was awful. it gave my phone 10 viruses!!! the notifications where so annoying and i couldn’t do anything on the app!!!! 😾😾

attributes.review: i come on here to find out allll of my pasta is gone. i’m telling you man, this is absolute no joke? what am i gonna eat? wanting me to starve? pasta is nothing to joke about, PLM! periodt.
attributes.title: unbelievable.
